entry.title: Del Monte - Mango Nectar - 960 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Del Monte
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 2.99 - 24.99 (2 variants)

Mango Nectar!
Bursting with tropical fruit taste, these Del Monte nectars provide delicious refreshment sure to please the whole family. They also add the perfect touch to summer cocktails and festive drinks.
•Made with mango purée
•No artificial flavours or colours
•Excellent source of Vitamin C - 100% of the recommended daily value of Vitamin C
•No preservatives
•Pasteurized
•Recyclable container
•Product from Canada

entry.title: Allen's - Cranberry Cocktail - 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Allen's
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 2.49 - 17.99 (2 variants)

 Allen's Tradition of quality!

Allen’s has been one of Canada’s favourite fruit juice brands for more than 80 years! Loved for its delicious and authentic apple flavour, this Ontario-born product has become a staple in the pantries of families all across the country.

No matter which Allen’s fruit juice or cocktail you choose, you can look forward to enjoying pleasure in every sip! Every day, we are committed to using our expertise to create delicious and refreshing drinks that everyone can be proud of.

•100% pure apple juice from concentrate
•No sugar added (only contains natural fruit sugar)
•Low Acid (Milder than our pure apple juice not from concentrate)
•Excellent source of Vitamin C - 100% of the recommended daily value
•No artificial flavours or colours
•Pasteurized
•Recyclable container
•Product of Canada
Refrigerate after opening and preferably consume within 10 days of opening. Serve chilled. Shake well before opening. Pasteurized.

entry.title: Rubicon - Guanabana Soursop Exotic Juice Drink - 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rubicon
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 3.99 - 26.99 (2 variants)

  • Rubicon - Guanabana Soursop Exotic Juice Drink - 1 L
  • Also known as Guanabana, Custard Apple or Sitaphal, the Soursop fruits most noticeable trait is its unique and fragrant taste profile. By selecting the finest Soursop from Vietnam, we have managed to create a refreshing juice that captures the true essence and sweet flavor of this exotic fruit!
  • 100% Juice - No sugar added
  • Rich in Vitamin C

entry.title: Rubicon - Pomegranate Exotic Juice Drink - 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rubicon
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 3.99 - 26.99 (2 variants)

Rubicon - Pomegranate Exotic Juice Drink - 1 L

Created using only 100% fruit juice and no added sugar, Rubicon brings you the taste of the finest Pomegranates in this mouthwatering juice drink blend.

Sweetened only by the natural sweetness of the fruits themselves, enjoy the sweet and naturally tart taste of this super fruit in our Pomegranate Juice drink.

entry.title: Rubicon - Lychee Exotic Juice Drink - 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rubicon
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 3.99 - 26.99 (2 variants)

Rubicon - Lychee Exotic Juice Drink - 1 L

Created using only 100% fruit juice and no added sugar, Rubicon brings you the taste of the finest Lychees in this mouthwatering juice drink blend.

Sweetened only by the natural sweetness of the fruits themselves, enjoy the sweet taste and fragrant aroma of our Lychee Juice drink.

entry.title: Rubicon - Passion Fruit Exotic Juice Drink - 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rubicon
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 3.99 - 26.99 (2 variants)

Rubicon - Passion Fruit Exotic Juice Drink - 1 L

Passion by name, passion by nature! This small exotic fruit is famed for its intense aroma, sweet mellow taste and distinctive sharp note!

Packing the most ripe Ecuadorian passion fruit into our juice drink, its now far easier to enjoy the true taste of this troublesome to eat, yet delicious exotic fruit!

entry.title: Rubicon - Guava Exotic Juice Drink - 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rubicon
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 3.99 - 26.99 (2 variants)

Rubicon - Guava Exotic Juice Drink - 1 L

Created using only 100% fruit juice and no added sugar, Rubicon brings you the taste of the finest Guavas in this delicious juice drink blend.

Sweetened only by the natural sweetness of the fruits themselves, enjoy the distinct sweet musky taste of our Guava Juice Drink.

Sweet & juicy using a combination of both white guava from India & pink guava from S. America. Tropical fruits high in nutrients with vitamin A, C & calcium.

entry.title: Rubicon - Mango Exotic Juice - 1 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rubicon
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 3.99 - 26.99 (2 variants)

Rubicon - Mango Exotic Juice - 1 L

We use the finest hand picked Alphonso Mangos (The king of mangos!) to create this delicious full bodied, refreshing juice drink.

With a secret formulation dating back over 30 years, our number one best seller delivers the true taste of this mouth-watering fruit.

entry.title: Oasis Classic - Exotic Pineapple Orange Juice - 960 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Oasis
Type: BEVERAGES
Price: 2.99 - 24.99 (2 variants)

Oasis Classic - Exotic Pineapple Orange Juice - 960 ml
Oasis Classic juice flavours for your table!
The Oasis Classic line has been winning over taste buds for more than 30 years! With so many juice flavours and no added sugar, you can enjoy a different delicious juice every day. Taste the nature at its best! Our promise to be pure!
•100% pure juice and other ingredients
•A blend of fruit juices made from concentrate
•No sugar added (only contains natural fruit sugar)
•Excellent source of Vitamin C - 100% of the recommended daily value of Vitamin C
•No preservatives
•Pasteurized
•Excellent juice to begin the day
•Recyclable container
•Product of Canada
Refrigerate after opening and preferably consume within 10 days of opening. Serve chilled. Shake well before opening. Pasteurized.
